Pre-Game Insights: Detroit and Atlanta are Eastern Conference foes set to play.Detroit finished 14-68 overall and 10-41 in Eastern Conference play last season.Atlanta finished 36-46 overall and 22-30 in Eastern Conference games last season.Detroit averaged 109.9 points per game and shot 46.3% from the field last season.Atlanta shot 46.5% from the field and 36.4% from 3-point range last season.Key players injured for Detroit: Bobi Klintman (calf) and Ausar Thompson (illness).Key players injured for Atlanta: De'Andre Hunter (knee - day to day), Bogdan Bogdanovic (hamstring - out), Trae Young (rib - day to day), Kobe Bufkin (shoulder - out), and Vit Krejci (adductor - out).
